report.title: Basic Photo Grid for Orthoptera recording
report.query:
SELECT '

' || co.preferred_taxon || '
' || co.default_common_name || '

Recorder: ' || CASE WHEN co.recorders IS NOT NULL THEN co.recorders WHEN savuser.text_value IS NOT NULL THEN savuser.text_value ELSE 'No recorder name' END || '
Date: ' || co.date_start || '
Location: ' || co.location_name || '

' as path FROM cache_occurrences co LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savuser ON savuser.sample_id=co.sample_id LEFT JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=co.id AND oi.deleted=false WHERE co.taxon_group_id in (106,108,115,119,59,60,61,62) AND co.record_status = 'V' AND oi.path != '' AND savuser.sample_attribute_id =58 GROUP BY oi.path,co.preferred_taxon,co.default_common_name,co.recorders,savuser.text_value,co.date_start,co.location_name
